name: laststaticsitegenerator
description: The LastStaticSiteGenerator combines the best tools for the job to simplify your frontend-developer live. Zero configuration! Hot-reloading everything!

scripts.clean: npm run clean:cache ; npm run clean:dist
scripts.dev: npm run clean && npm run message:dev && run-p --race dev:eleventy dev:parcel
scripts.dev:https: npm run clean && npm run message:dev && run-p --race dev:eleventy dev:parcel:https
scripts.message:dev: echo 'Your site will be available at: http://127.0.0.1:1234/index.html'
scripts.production: npm run clean:cache && rm -rf ./dist && npm run production:eleventy && npm run production:parcel
scripts.production:pwa: npm run clean:cache && rm -rf ./dist && npm run production && workbox injectManifest workbox-config.js && workbox copyLibraries dist/ && mv $(find ./dist -name \*workbox\* -type d -maxdepth 1 -print | head -n1) ./dist/workbox

author: Kolja Kutschera
